page.title: 08Attitudes
page.content: Oil: The development of the Humbly Grove oilfield in the block caused much local concern about the possible spoilation of the natural environment. A local pressure group HOPE (Hampshire Oil -Protection of Environment) was formed and its activities prompted the Hampshire County Council to order stringent conditions for protection of the environment when they approved the proposals for development of the oilfield. Consequently one wellsite was moved about 200 metres to a location which provided better screening and another moved the same distance to protect the habitat of a relatively rare butterfly, the Duke of Burgundy Fritillary. High earth mounds have been built up around the wellsites with grass and trees to hide pumping equipment in the landscape .
